alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 8:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 847 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Kenton, or 38 miles southwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
